channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Image Hover Effects
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Image Hover Effects

item.title: CVE-2022-4010|2024-08-03T01:27:54.128Z -- unknown -- image%20hover%20effects
item.description: The Image Hover Effects WordPress plugin before 5.5 does not sanitise and escape some of its settings, which could allow high privilege users such as admin to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks even when the unfiltered_html capability is disallowed (for example in multisite setup).
